thread.section_title: Leo Hostel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Beijing, China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Overall great hostel
thread.title_full: Overall great hostel - Review of Leo Hostel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: NadineTanja
title: Overall great hostel
text:
The location confused the taxi driver at first as the taxi couldn't go down the street, however it is easily accessible with two stations and Tiananmen Square within walking distance.
The rooms where clean as were the showers and the staff extremely helpful and polite. The girls toilets were outside and since I went in winter they were a little cold, but clean.
Like any hostel it can get a bit loud when others come in, but felt very secure and comfortable.
Would recommend this place.
